thing-type.label: Zigbee Automation
thing-type.description: An OpenWebNet Zigbee automation device to control roller shutters, blinds, etc. BTicino models: xxx/yyyy/etc.

parameter.name: shutterRun
parameter.label: Shutter Run
parameter.description: Time (in ms) to go from max position (e.g. CLOSED) to the other position (e.g. OPEN). Example: 12000 (=12sec). Use AUTO (default) to calibrate the shutter automatically (UP->DOWN->Position%) the first time a Position command (%) is sent.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: OpenWebNet Address (where)
parameter.description: It identifies one Zigbee device. Example: where="765432101#9"
